name: kimberly-agents
description: Custom Copilot agents reflecting roles in the Kimberly project

chatParticipants.name: backend-developer
chatParticipants.description: Backend Developer agent for server-side logic and API development

chatParticipants.name: frontend-developer
chatParticipants.description: Frontend Developer agent for user interfaces and client-side applications

chatParticipants.name: engineering-lead
chatParticipants.description: Engineering Lead agent for technical architecture and oversight

chatParticipants.name: sre
chatParticipants.description: SRE agent for system reliability and operations

chatParticipants.name: devops-engineer
chatParticipants.description: DevOps Engineer agent for infrastructure and deployment

chatParticipants.name: qa-engineer
chatParticipants.description: QA Engineer agent for software quality and testing

chatParticipants.name: security-engineer
chatParticipants.description: Security Engineer agent for threat protection and secure implementation

chatParticipants.name: privacy-data-engineer
chatParticipants.description: Privacy/Data Engineer agent for data privacy and compliance

chatParticipants.name: legal-advisor
chatParticipants.description: Legal Advisor agent for legal compliance and risk mitigation

chatParticipants.name: product-manager
chatParticipants.description: Product Manager agent for product vision and delivery

chatParticipants.name: ui-ux-designer
chatParticipants.description: UI/UX Designer agent for user interfaces and experiences

commands.name: design
commands.description: Discuss UI/UX design and user experience

chatParticipants.name: branding-manager
chatParticipants.description: Branding Manager agent for brand identity and management

chatParticipants.name: ml-engineer
chatParticipants.description: ML Engineer agent for machine learning models and AI integrations

chatParticipants.name: api-engineer
chatParticipants.description: API Engineer agent for API design and integration

chatParticipants.name: documentation-engineer
chatParticipants.description: Documentation Engineer agent for project documentation

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
